entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #51946
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, single_query #51945
  • Add an easy-to-find doc with a dependency flow graph #51944
  • Blazor enhanced form handling doesn't honor button `formmethod` attribute #51940
    Planning: WebUI
  • CreateInboundActivityHandler override in .net 8 RC2 not being called #51934
  • Perf regression: endpoint, json #51931
  • Blazor webassembly subpath doesn't work #51929
  • System.Net.Internals.SocketExceptionFactory.ExtendedSocketException #51927
  • ASP0000 warning when using `Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web` Sdk in project file #51926

Closed

  • Dotnet watch run broken with arguments #51921
  • Perf improvement: json #51930
  • [Blazor] Clarify the statement: Using an event callback parameter with @bind:after isn't supported. #51932
  • Imports in templates should be `global::` prefixed #51928
  • Can't start debugging with MS Edge #51822
  • Improvements to auth and identity in ASP.NET Core 8 #51906
    Discussions
  • NavigationManager.NavigateTo("urlInOtherDomain") causes Uncaught (in promise) WebSocket is not in the OPEN state in Firefox #51936
  • BlazorEnableCompression flag is ignored when publishing Blazor WASM projects #50451
    .NET 8: Documentation
  • Error using RenderModeInteractiveWebAssembly attribute in .NET Core 8 Blazor template project Webassembly #51937
  • Perf regression: plaintext, plaintext #51919
  • Replace outdated dependencies in Blazor Server project template #44606
    Planning: WebUI
  • StaticWebAssetBasePath not taken into account with JavaScript module initalizer #38690
    Planning: WebUI
  • InputSelect bug #33799
    Planning: WebUI
  • JSON/Blazor regression on deserializing IJSInProcessObjectReference with a constructor #37149
    Planning: WebUI

PullRequests

Created

  • Mark API from 8 as shipped #51948
    area-infrastructure
  • Mark API from 8.0 as shipped #51947
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Fix "Blazor enhanced form handling doesn't honor button `formmethod` attribute" #51942
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Update branding to 8.0.1 #51918
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • Update SDK to 23556.1 #51907
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0] Fix AwaitableSocketAsyncEventArgs reorderings on weaker memory models #51662
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-networking, 7.0.13
  • [release/6.0] Fix AwaitableSocketAsyncEventArgs reorderings on weaker memory models #51663
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-networking, 6.0.24
  • [release/7.0] Update JS dependencies for `WebAssembly.Authentication` #51813
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, tell-mode, 7.0.13
  • [release/6.0] Update JS dependencies for `WebAssembly.Authentication` #51817
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, tell-mode, 6.0.24
  • ResourceManagerStringLocalizerTest: support running tests under the invariant culture. #51935
    community-contribution, area-ui-rendering, 9.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #51943
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, 9.0-preview1
  • Update branding to 7.0.15 #51917
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.13
  • Update branding to 6.0.26 #51916
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.24
  • Use working directory as relative directory for project file resolution #51762
    area-commandlinetools, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • http.sys: Allow configuring HTTP_AUTH_EX_FLAGs as options #51833
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • 47569 - Using FrozenDictionary in HttpMethodDictionaryPolicyJumpTable #51803
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Improve path search in Kestrel parsing #51535
    Perf, feature-kestrel, area-networking
  • Dispose secret instances #51253
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • doc(DenyAnonymousAuthorizationRequirement): Actual behaviour is different than class name #51490
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-security
  • [Component governance] Bump the Azure.Identity dependency #51616
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `7e33b6a` to `b10fad3` #51801
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `68cd408` to `2c27dd2` #51802
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Skip failing template tests on Win11-arm64 #51311
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `1d1834b` to `99a804e` #51799
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [Component governance] Bump the Azure.Identity dependency #51612
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `e47544a` to `b10fad3` #51800
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Use IProblemDetailService in ValidationProblem #51464
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Avoid requiring ProblemDetailsService when IExeptionHandler is used #51898
    area-networking, area-middleware
  • Simplify redis cache setup #49722
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Fix ambiguous route analyzer false positive with switch #51881
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
